description: Get the resource policy for a specified resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource of which its resource policy is fetched.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicy
nested_items.description: The content of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The resources that a policy is attached to.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The content of a resource policy.
